entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Snow over higher terrain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Snow over higher terrain this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
